en.title: Support Project
en.aboutText1: PersonaUI is a passionate solo project by Sakushi-Dev ‚Äî an open-source AI companion that runs completely locally, respects your data, and offers unique persona experiences.
en.aboutText2: My goal is to continuously develop PersonaUI ‚Äî with better personas, intelligent memory (Cortex), and a UI that feels like a real conversation. Every bit of support helps me invest more time in this project.
en.noteTitle: A word on transparency: PersonaUI is and will remain open source and free. This option exists only for those who want to voluntarily support the project ‚Äî no features are unlocked, no content is withheld. Promise. ü§ù
en.kofiText: If you enjoy PersonaUI, you can buy me a coffee:
en.starText: You can also support the project by leaving a ‚≠ê Star on GitHub:
